channel.title: Shard, Mezzyscape Magic Bug
channel.description:
Hello Everyone
Basically if you dont have the right runes for a spell and you have arrow and a bow equiped or throwing weapons you can double click and still cast a spell without the correct runes, you can also cast a freezing spell that hits 20 ish. Any ideas on how to fix would be good thanks james.

item.title: Shard, Mezzyscape Magic Bug
item.dc:creator: @Enyo Enyo
item.description:
@Enyo wrote:

Thanks mate for the reply I will have a look.

Read full topic

item.title: Shard, Mezzyscape Magic Bug
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

In your combat code you need to add in checks to make sure what equipment the person is using, and that they can still cast the spell.

  • I can’t help much more than that as I’ve never messed with Mezzyscape/Shard.

Read full topic
